law.text: All bequests or donations made for a specified use with regard to the state vocational education program, vocational education facilities, vocational education personnel, or present or prospective vocational education pupils shall be applied to that use and no other so long as it is consistent with appropriate Kentucky Revised Statutes and the state plan for vocational education.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 593, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 327, sec. 7.
